titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CRITICAL CARE DISCHARGE YEAR AND MONTH - Description

body.p: CRITICAL CARE DISCHARGE YEAR AND MONTH is the year and month that a CRITICAL CARE PERIOD ended.
For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care , this item is submitted instead of CRITICAL CARE DISCHARGE DATE AND TIME , where the data set record is anonymised.
